max_messages.title: Max Records
max_messages.description: Number of records to emit per stream. Min 1. Max 100 billion.

seed.title: Random Seed
seed.description: When the seed is unspecified, the current time millis will be used as the seed. Range: [0, 1000000].

message_interval_ms.title: Message Interval (ms)
message_interval_ms.description: Interval between messages in ms. Min 0 ms. Max 60000 ms (1 minute).

oneOf.title: Single Schema
oneOf.description: A catalog with one or multiple streams that share the same schema.

stream_schema.title: Stream Schema
stream_schema.description: A Json schema for the stream. The schema should be compatible with draft-07. See this doc for examples.

stream_duplication.title: Duplicate the stream N times
stream_duplication.description: Duplicate the stream for easy load testing. Each stream name will have a number suffix. For example, if the stream name is "ds", the duplicated streams will be "ds_0", "ds_1", etc.

oneOf.title: Multi Schema
oneOf.description: A catalog with multiple data streams, each with a different schema.

stream_schemas.title: Streams and Schemas
stream_schemas.description: A Json object specifying multiple data streams and their schemas. Each key in this object is one stream name. Each value is the schema for that stream. The schema should be compatible with draft-07. See this doc for examples.
